title: Resteasy-reactive Uni<Void> endpoint reported as "Run time writers required"

labels.name: triage/out-of-date
labels.description: This issue/PR is no longer valid or relevant

body:
### Describe the bug

In dev the UI in the reasteasy reactive endpoint scoring part, my "Uni<Void>" controller are shown as "Run time writers required" but the writer can be determined at compile time

### Expected behavior

The correct writer is reported in the Dev UI console

### Actual behavior

The endpoint is reported "Run time writers required"

### How to Reproduce?

Create a 3.2.10.Final Quarkus app
Add the resteasy reactive extension
Create an endpoint returning "Uni<Void>"
Go to the dev UI

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.2.10.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

See https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/27413
